channel.title: Australian Government Announcements (Daily)
channel.description: Unified feed of Australian government announcements generated daily

item.title: Appeal for public assistance after 80kg of cocaine seized in Sydney
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Shepparton man guilty of importing anime child abuse material
item.description: A 25-year-old Shepparton man has been convicted of child abuse material offences after ABF officers discovered alarming anime images on his mobile phone at the airport.

item.title: Eleven foreign fishers found guilty, including shark finning crew
item.description: This is a joint media release from the Australian Fisheries Management Authority (AFMA) and Australian Border Force (ABF)

item.title: Norwegian diving duo sentenced over thwarted $26 million cocaine import plot
item.description: This is a joint media release between Australian Federal Police, NSW Police Force and Australian Border Force

item.title: NSW man charged with allegedly producing AI-generated child abuse material and possessing bestiality content
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police, NSW Police Force and Australian Border Force.

item.title: ABF detains foreign fishers, destroys boats and seizes 2.1 tonnes of sea cucumber
item.description: Two fishing vessels were also destroyed after allegedly illegally fishing in waters off the Northern Territory

item.title: Joint Organised Crime Task Force arrests French national
item.description: This is a joint media statement between the NT Police Force, Australian Border Force and Australian Federal Police

item.title: Sydney – the digital incoming passenger card pilot program is here for Trans-Tasman travel
item.description: The next phase of passengers to trial Australia’s digital alternative to the paper incoming passenger card (IPC) is here

item.title: More vessels, fishers apprehended suspected of illegal fishing
item.description: Shark fins were also found on one of the illegal foreign fishing vessels

item.title: Man arrested after cache of imitation guns, magazines, military equipment seized
item.description: A significant amount of imitation firearms, magazines and military style equipment was seized from this Central Coast home

item.title: South Australian man charged with allegedly importing heroin into Adelaide in suitcase

item.title: Tobacco takedown: New data reveals a historic high in illicit hauls
item.description: Skip to navigation Skip to main content  Open in a new tabOpen in this tab Loading New data shows the Australian Border Force (ABF) intercepted record volumes of illicit

item.title: Date night disaster: kilos of cocaine and meth hidden in chocolate and wine
item.description: Skip to navigation Skip to main content  Open in a new tabOpen in this tab Loading Australian Border Force (ABF) officers at Sydney’s International Mail Gateway Facility have

item.title: Operation Sovereign Borders Monthly Update: June 2025
item.description: This statement provides an update on Operation Sovereign Borders (OSB) activities related to the reception and processing of Unauthorised Maritime Arrivals (UMAs)*.

item.title: WA man charged following liquid meth seizures in Perth
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Perth Airport luggage search leads to CACT restraint of about $7 million in WA assets in tax evasion and money laundering investigation
item.description: Skip to navigation Skip to main content  Open in a new tabOpen in this tab Loading Editor’s note: Image, footage and audio grabs available​ via Hightail

item.title: Queensland man charged with attempting to import hundreds of firearm parts from the USA
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: MAST detectives seize 46 million illicit cigarettes; additional charges laid
item.description: This is a joint media release between NSW Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Second person charged over failed $45 million cocaine importation in marine engines in QLD
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Final men sentenced over failed 42kg cocaine heist in Sydney
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force.

item.title: Crackdown on child-like sex doll imports across NSW results in multiple arrests
item.description: The ABF is cracking down on attempted importations of child-like sex dolls, executing seven Commonwealth search warrants across the state.

item.title: Couple jailed in WA over 56kg cocaine import plot
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police, Australian Border Force, Australian Criminal Intelligence Commission and Department of Home Affairs

item.title: WA man allegedly soliciting child abuse material from overseas
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police, Australian Border Force and Western Australia Police Force

item.title: Victorian man charged with allegedly possessing illicit drugs and $130,000 in dirty cash
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Trio arrested over alleged plot to import 600kg of meth concealed in rolls of fabric
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police & Australian Border Force

item.title: Nineteen Indonesian sea cucumber poachers fined $74,500
item.description: This is a joint media release from the Australian Fisheries Management Authority (AFMA) and Australian Border Force (ABF)

item.title: Steroid lab dismantled after ABF investigation
item.description: ABF officers in Western Australia have dismantled a performance and image enhancing drug operation after seizing thousands steroid vials and tablets.

item.title: French women charged with 32kg meth import at Brisbane Airport
item.description: Two French women have appeared before the Brisbane Magistrates Court charged for their alleged roles in a failed plot to import 32kg of methamphetamine into Australia.

item.title: No excuses for violence, abuse against ABF officers
item.description: There is no excuse for abuse or violence towards Australian Border Force (ABF) officers.

item.title: ABF strikes record illicit tobacco detections across NSW
item.description: The Australian Border Force (ABF) has uncovered a significant surge in illicit tobacco detections in New South Wales over the past three weeks, intercepting multiple major consignments of undeclared and illegal tobacco products at both air and sea ports.

item.title: SA man charged over alleged involvement in 62kg cocaine importation
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: ABF on the lookout for Hunter locals as international airport takes off
item.description: The Australian Border Force (ABF) is looking for Hunter locals who believe they have what it takes to join the nation’s border protection and customs service on a casual basis.

item.title: SA man charged with alleged child abuse offences
item.description: This is a joint Australian Federal Police, South Australia Police and Australian Border Force release

item.title: Four women charged in Brisbane over spicy drug importation
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Fifteen foreign fishers apprehended, 120kg sea cucumber seized
item.description: Fifteen illegal foreign fishers apprehended as Operation LUNAR continues in the Northern Territory.

item.title: Trio arrested over plot to import $333m of meth in mosaic tiles
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Sydney man charged after child abuse material is discovered hidden in his underwear
item.description: A 52 year old man has appeared in court today after a significant quantity of child abuse material (CAM) was discovered hidden around his body and on his personal devices after arriving into Sydney airport.

item.title: A decade of service: Celebrating 10 years of the Australian Border Force
item.description: Skip to navigation Skip to main content  Open in a new tabOpen in this tab Loading Today our agency celebrates and reflects on 10 years of the Australian Border Force (ABF

item.description: Skip to navigation Skip to main content  Open in a new tabOpen in this tab Loading The reporting period is from 01 May 2025 to 31 May 2025 Share Online Share on Facebook Share

item.title: Father and son sentenced over opium import
item.description: A South Australian father and son have been sentenced yesterday (26 June 2025) for importing opium and tobacco.

item.title: Illegal foreign fishing crew catches $40,000 in fines
item.description: This is a joint media release from the Australian Fisheries Management Authority (AFMA) and Australian Border Force (ABF)

item.title: Detector dog puppies’ rush for gold-hearted foster carers in Ballarat, Whittlesea
item.description: The Australian Border Force (ABF) has announced it is expanding its Detector Dog Program (DDP) foster carer network to additional regional locations throughout Victoria.

item.title: WA man in court over alleged online child abuse offences
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Sydney man charged with allegedly facilitating air mail drug import scheme
item.description: This is a joint media release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: New Zealand man to face court for allegedly flying to Sydney with cocaine blocks in his suitcase
item.description: This is a joint media release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: International operation leads to the seizure of half a tonne of cocaine
item.description: Over half a tonne of cocaine has been preventing from reaching Australian shores during Australian Border Force-led Operation TELEMORE.

item.title: South Australian man charged over precursor import
item.description: The ABF has charged a South Australian man for his alleged role in importing pseudoephedrine to supply a suspected methamphetamine manufacturing operation.

item.title: Increased eligibility at Australian Arrivals SmartGates from this week
item.description: Australia’s SmartGate technology is about to become more family friendly, thanks to improved eligibility for children and teenage ePassport holders entering into Australia from this week.

item.title: Fines and imprisonment for 16 illegal foreign fishers
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Fisheries Management Authority and the Australian Border Force

item.title: Indigenous rangers, ABF detect and apprehend foreign fishers in the NT
item.description: Information about suspicious activity which may impact the security of Australia's borders can be provided to Border Watch online.

item.title: NSW man charged for alleged role in US drug trafficking operation
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force.

item.title: QLD men jailed in NT over failed cocaine mail import concealed in sneakers
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Authorities seize 253kg of cocaine in Brisbane, worth $82 million
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Border Force and Australian Federal Police

item.title: Alleged QLD money laundering organisation dismantled after washing more than $10 million, four charged
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police, Queensland Police Service, Australian Border Force, Australian Criminal Intelligence Commission, Australian Transaction Reports and Analysis Centre, and Australian Taxation Office

item.title: Mince, meth and money: WA man charged for alleged role in Christmas Island drug trafficking
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: French national charged for allegedly importing more than 10kg of meth into Western Australia
item.description: This is a joint media statement between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: ABF destroys three foreign fishing vessels and apprehends 27 fishers in Australian waters
item.description: Authorities transported the 27 crew members of the three vessels to Darwin where they will be investigated by AFMA for alleged offences against the Fisheries Management Act 1991 (Cth)

item.title: Canberra man in court for online child abuse charges after being arrested moments before flight to Chile
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: WA man jailed for accessing, possessing and transmitting child abuse material
item.description: This is a joint release between the Australian Federal Police, Australian Border Force and Western Australia Police Force

item.title: Sydney woman jailed over heroin in hammocks import plot
item.description: An investigation began on 16 October 2024, when Australian Border Force (ABF) officers at Sydney Airport stopped the woman after she arrived on an international flight

item.title: Operation Sovereign Borders Monthly Update: April 2025
item.description: This statement provides an update on Operation Sovereign Borders (OSB) activities related to the reception and processing of unauthorised maritime arrivals (UMAs)*.

item.title: Multi agency focus to bring down criminals this World No Tobacco Day
item.description: This World No Tobacco day, the Australian Border Force (ABF) is exposing industry tactics and putting criminals on notice.

item.title: ABF targets Northern Rivers and SEQ hospitality industry to protect migrant workers
item.description: ABF Sponsor Monitoring Unit officers (SMU) visited Northern Rivers and SEQ businesses to educate and prevent exploitation of migrant workers.

item.title: New SmartGate Kiosks go live at Sydney Airport fast-tracking international arrivals
item.description: This is a joint media statement between Sydney Airport and Australian Border Force

item.title: Six children removed from harm in Philippines after Darwin man charged with alleged online child abuse offences
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police, Northern Territory Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Daughter joins father behind bars over WA meth mail import
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Lunar arrests in connection to offshore illicit tobacco syndicate leader
item.description: This is a joint release between Victoria Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Two charged in NSW over plot to import cocaine hidden on board international flight
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police, NSW Police Force and Australian Border Force

item.title: ABF operations bolster protection of migrant workers in Far North Queensland
item.description: ABF officers visited more than 20 businesses in the region and uncovered a number of visa violations and migrant worker exploitation issues

item.title: Man refused bail after ABF officers allegedly locate child abuse material
item.description: This is a joint media release between Australian Border Force and the Australian Federal Police.

item.title: Firearms seized - Acacia Hills, Northern Territory
item.description: This is a joint media release between the NT Police and the Australian Border Force

item.title: Eighteen Indonesian nationals found guilty of illegal fishing
item.description: This is a joint media release from the Australian Fisheries Management Authority (AFMA) and Australian Border Force (ABF)

item.title: ABF acts to protect migrant workers in hospitality industry with national operation
item.description: Australian Border Force (ABF) officers from the Department of Home Affairs have launched a national operation targeting exploitation and abuse of migrant workers in the hospitality industry.

item.title: Eighth person charged over alleged role in large-scale meth manufacturing syndicate
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: ABF visit gets Broome school kids into new type of uniform
item.description: Students at St Mary’s College in Broome have some special new outfits to choose from after a recent visit by officers from the Australian Border Force.

item.title: WA woman jailed for eight years for attempting to possess almost 11kg of meth
item.description: This is a joint release between the Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Chinese national in WA court charged with online child abuse offences
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Third person charged after investigation into 237kg MDMA import with vapes, cash seized
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Sentence increased for two men involved in second largest importation of cocaine into SA
item.description: Skip to navigation Skip to main content  Open in a new tabOpen in this tab Loading Editor’s note: Arrest vision and images available via Hightail Both men were charged in 2024

item.title: Sydney man charged over plot to import almost 220kg of illicit drugs in granite tiles
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force
